extension.summary: Launches Big Box from within Kodi.
extension.description: Launches Big Box from within Kodi. It will close or minimize Kodi, launch Big Box and when Big Box is exited Kodi will restart or maximize, with the option to run programs pre/post Big Box. LaunchBox and Big Box are developed by Unbroken Software, LLC. Please visit www.launchbox-app.com for more details.
